thread.section_title: Tony Kealys Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Tony Kealys | tonykealys.com
thread.title: Linda Deering
thread.title_full: Tony Kealys reviewed by Linda Deering

author: Linda Deering
title: Linda Deering
text: So far all our big purchases have been in the Tony kealys store in Walkinstown. The staff are great they will talk you through the product and give a demo. For us this was seeing if the bugaboo would fit in my yaris with the car seat also installed, the lady had no problem coming outside to go through everything. They show you how to properly install the car seat too. And since then we've been back to purchase a high chair which my son got to try out in store again with no problem. I've also purchased online with them andy order was delivered the next day which I thought was great since I'm not dublin based. So in summary great shop with great stock and great service and I highly recommend it!
